EmailTemplate.name: 2020 Dealer Update #5.2020 Dealer Update #5
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins - June 2, 2020
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Sales Bulletins | June 2020 New Sales Bulletin Honeywell is pleased to announce the following bulletin:
- 2020-40 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-40 REV A - Laseref IV Upgrade for Business Aircraft - All Dealers.pdf]]> Laseref IV Upgrade for Business Aircraft
Dealers can find 2020 sales bulletins on our website <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace]]> under Purchase/Orders/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
